# Usage

<!-- This is generated by scripts/generate-usage.sh. Don't edit this file directly. -->

```console
$ tfrstate help
NAME:
   tfrstate - Find directories where a given terraform_remote_state data source is used

USAGE:
   tfrstate [global options] command [command options]

VERSION:
    ()

COMMANDS:
   version     Show version
   find        Find directories where a given terraform_remote_state data source is used
   completion  Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, or fish
   help, h     Shows a list of commands or help for one command

GLOBAL OPTIONS:
   --log-level value  log level
   --log-color value  Log color. One of 'auto' (default), 'always', 'never'
   --help, -h         show help
   --version, -v      print the version
```

## tfrstate find

```console
$ tfrstate help find
NAME:
   tfrstate find - Find directories where a given terraform_remote_state data source is used

USAGE:
   tfrstate find [command options]

OPTIONS:
   --output-format value                                  Output format. One of 'json' (default), 'markdown' (default: "json")
   --plan-json value                                      The file path to the plan file in JSON format
   --base-dir value                                       The file path to the directory where Terraform configuration files are located
   --backend-dir value                                    The file path to the given Terraform Root Module
   --s3-bucket value                                      S3 Bucket Name of terraform_remote_state data source
   --s3-key value                                         S3 Bucket Key of terraform_remote_state data source
   --output value, -o value [ --output value, -o value ]  Output name of terraform_remote_state data source
   --help, -h                                             show help
```

## tfrstate completion

```console
$ tfrstate help completion
NAME:
   tfrstate completion - Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, or fish

USAGE:
   tfrstate completion command [command options]

DESCRIPTION:
   Output shell completion script for bash, zsh, or fish.
   Source the output to enable completion.

   e.g.

   .bashrc

   eval "$(tfrstate completion bash)"

   .zshrc

   source <(tfrstate completion zsh)

   fish

   tfrstate completion fish > ~/.config/fish/completions/tfrstate.fish

```

## tfrstate version

```console
$ tfrstate help version
NAME:
   tfrstate version - Show version

USAGE:
   tfrstate version [command options]

OPTIONS:
   --json      (default: false)
   --help, -h  show help
```
